channel.title: Nexus RPG Playtests (PBTA)
channel.description:
Playtest sessions for RPG in Development!
= Nexus RPG (PBTA) Modern Fantasy/Other Worlds =
- Loads of Magic! - Feedback requested
Note - Sessions WILL be recorded-Need to rewatch and review! (video can be marked private instead of public though)
Trying to run through some rules, see what works/how etc
WILL try hard to have include narrative and have fun, but focus is on specific rules.
- Game style - Mage the Awakening + Fairy Tail Anime - X-Card will be in use.
If you have any questions hit me up on gauntlet slack, forums or twitter @flyingfox369
1 - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Mmt3o_bvYUdnQULRjzs 2 - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Mmt410yPSYpam8KKNOq 3 - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Mmt4G7jd13742nick0A 4 - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Mmt4SYeI9k6qFhjOFrb

item.title: Nexus RPG Playtests (PBTA)
item.dc:creator: @BlakeRyan
item.description:
@BlakeRyan wrote:

Playtest sessions for RPG in Development!

= Nexus RPG (PBTA) Modern Fantasy/Other Worlds =

  • Loads of Magic!
  • Feedback requested

Note - Sessions WILL be recorded-Need to rewatch and review!
(video can be marked private instead of public though)

Trying to run through some rules, see what works/how etc

WILL try hard to have include narrative and have fun, but focus is on specific rules.

  • Game style - Mage the Awakening + Fairy Tail Anime
  • X-Card will be in use.

If you have any questions hit me up on gauntlet slack, forums or twitter @flyingfox369
